titleStmt.title: The vanity of the lives and passions of men. Written by D. Papillon, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Papillon, David, 1581-1655?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert White, and are to be sold by George Calvert, at the sign of the half-Moon in Wattling-Street, near St. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Imprimatur by John Downame is dated: April. 9. 1651.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the half-Moon in Wattling-Street, near St. Austins Gate
